description.title: The description Schema
examples: Nirvana is a twin system of algorithmic wealth & ultra low-risk stablecoin on the Solana network.  It produces the ANA token: an algorithmic metastable token that serves as a store of wealth.  And it produces the NIRV token: a decentralized superstable store of value.

examples.name: Nirvana
examples.description: Nirvana is a twin system of algorithmic wealth & ultra low-risk stablecoin on the Solana network.  It produces the ANA token: an algorithmic metastable token that serves as a store of wealth.  And it produces the NIRV token: a decentralized superstable store of value.

nirvana.name: Nirvana
nirvana.description: Nirvana is a twin system of algorithmic wealth & ultra low-risk stablecoin on the Solana network.  It produces the ANA token: an algorithmic metastable token that serves as a store of wealth.  And it produces the NIRV token: a decentralized superstable store of value.

uxd.name: UXD
uxd.description: UXD Protocol is an algorithmic stablecoin that is fully backed by a delta-neutral position using derivatives.

calcifer.name: Calcifer
calcifer.description: Calcifer Finance is a self repaying loan suite, using a brand new synthetic asset, calUSD. The platform creates advances on your yield farming via calUSD that represents a claim on any underlying collateral in Calcifer Finance.
